scripts.build:all: npm run build --workspace=remcli && npm run export:web --workspace=remcli-app
scripts.start: npm run build --workspace=remcli && node packages/remcli-cli/bin/remcli.mjs daemon start
scripts.start:tunnel: npm run build --workspace=remcli && node packages/remcli-cli/bin/remcli.mjs daemon start --tunnel
